      • normalizeVector

        public static Vector<FloatingPoint> normalizeVector(Vector<FloatingPoint> v)
        Normalizes a vector.

        This is useful to compare whether vectors are parallel (v1 = r * v2). The method will divide the vector by the square root of the squared vector: v / sqrt(v2).

        Parameters:
        v - vector.
        Returns:
        normalized vector.

      • getVectorHash

        public static int getVectorHash(Vector<FloatingPoint> v)
        Gets hash code of a vector with rounding, so vectors with almost the same value due to numerical errors will get the same hash code.

        This is used to detect if oracle is asked multiple times with the same wz-vector to call the approx.-algorithm.

        Parameters:
        v - vector.
        Returns:
        integer as hash code.
